channel.title: Experience on Laura Sinclair
channel.description: Recent content in Experience on Laura Sinclair

item.title: CareerFoundry
item.description: Execute on all phases of the design process, from wireframing concepts and mockups through to handovers to developers. Improving branding image and consistency through digital materials for social media, presentations, website assets, sales collaterals, etc. Identifying and understanding customer needs, and work with team members to improve their online experience. Translating ideas and concepts into compelling, visual solutions. Working in close collaboration with lots of different teams, including designers, developers, marketing strategists, copywriters.

item.title: Pixiyo
item.description: Handling projects from intake to production, then delivery - making sure they were shipped right on time. And that our clients had a smile on their face üôÇ Designing, coding and maintaining websites, using Wordpress (we all know how this goes ü§Ø) Creating brand identities, defining their guidelines (logos, colours, fonts, etc.) Visual assets for various brands, the usual stuff. Social media banners, icons, etc. Our biggest project was for Valdys Group, who offers all-inclusive spa, restaurants and hotels resorts.

item.title: Vupar
item.description: Design and coding of HTML e-mail campaigns (coding from scratch and testing emails with Litmus, then using MJML ‚ù§Ô∏è) Working closely with our Creative Director to create and/or update assets for print and digital marketing materials‚Ä®That means: landing pages, social media assets, websites, blogs, corporate identities, business cards, and banner ads. Communicating with our clients about details surrounding their requests, gathering additional information if necessary

item.title: Malabar Design
item.description: I was in charge of producing and delivering assets for the brand. LOTS of photo editing and retouching Delivering 4000+ graphic assets Adjusting to each brand‚Äôs visual guidelines Extremely short deadlines, last-minute requests

item.title: Moneo Payment Solutions
item.description: Moneo Resto: Designing Moneo Resto‚Äôs website Designing their whole app, allowing you to check and credit your account, share the bill with friends, report a stolen/lost card Designing business cards, social media assets, and smart cards Moneo Etudiant: Creating assets for online advertising campaigns. Each campaign included: social media assets, website background ads, flyers, html emails, facebook game templates Designing and building a student community blog Creating material, like videos, guides, or mascots, to promote the brand
